description: The earth's polar regions are today experiencing the greatest environmental change anywhere on
earth.  This course explores the historical, literary, and artistic works from places of great
beauty and natural extremes: accounts from the turn-of-the-century heroic expeditions; early- to
mid-20th-century photographers, writers, and scientists; and the works of contemporary artists
